response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. We understand its value to you is estimated at $800,000, and based on our assessment, we are excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to fostering long-term partnerships with our esteemed clients. Should you decide to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction process and unparalleled customer support throughout your journey with our product. Please let us know your decision within the next 48 hours. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
